text: Jerash University or Jerash Private University (Arabic: جامعة جرش الخاصة) is the only university in Jerash Governorate, Jordan, located about 5 km from Jerash city center. The university offers undergraduate degrees in Arts and science. == Academics == There were ten colleges in the university in 2012: * Faculty of Information Technology * Faculty of Literature: Offers graduate and undergraduate degrees in Arabic language and English language and literature. * Faculty of Nursing * Faculty of Engineering * Faculty of Science * Faculty of Economics and Administrative Science * Faculty of Educational Sciences * Faculty of Shari'a (Islamic Studies): established in 1993, and offers graduate and undergraduate degrees in Islamic studies. * Faculty of Agriculture: the only private university in Jordan that offers a degree in agricultural sciences * Faculty of Law * Faculty of Pharmacy == Library == The university library is composed of five halls containing 108,000 books and offers the university students access to 168 accredited journals. == Centers == * University Language Center == References == ==External links== * Jerash University website Category:Educational institutions established in 1992 Category:Jerash Governorate Category:Universities in Jordan Category:1992 establishments in Jordan
title: Jerash University
